

	This is an example file for knowing the people behind a website.
	More info at https://humanstxt.org


	/* TEAM */

	Position   : Developer
	Person     : John Doe
	Site       : example.com
	Location   : City, Country

	Position   : 
	Person     : 
	Site       : 
	Location   : 


	/* THANKS */

	Person     : John Smith
	Comment    : Appreciation for something useful.
	Site       : example.com

	Person     : 
	Comment    : 
	Site       : 


	/* COMPONENTS */

	Name       : Settler
	Site       : https://kiriniy.github.io/settler

	Name       : jQuery
	Site       : https://jquery.com

	Name       : Bootstrap
	Site       : https://getbootstrap.com

	Name       : Font Awesome
	Site       : https://fontawesome.io

	Name       : Animate.css
	Site       : https://animate.style

	Name       : Cookies
	Site       : https://github.com/studio24/cookie-message


	/* SITE */

	Updated    : DD/MM/YYYY
	Languages  : 
	Technology : 
	Software   :
